description: This chicken noodle miso soup is warming and comforting.
keywords: Chicken soup,Tree nut free,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chicken Noodle Miso Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5L chicken stock, hot, made with 2 stock cubes
2 medium carrots, peeled and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, deep pan and cook the spring onions, chilli and garlic for 2 minutes. Add the chicken and cook for 5 minutes until browned.
Stir in the miso paste and cook for 2 minutes. Pour over the stock, bring to the boil, add the cabbage and carrots and cook for 5 minutes.
Add the noodles, reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Serve with lime wedges.
